queryDbListDeviceA: SELECT DeviceId FROM [HDA].[dbo].[KyoKFSDevice] a with (nolock) Inner join KyoKFSGroups b with (nolock) on a.GroupId = b.GroupId Inner join KyoKFSGroups d with (nolock) on b.OriginGroupId = d.GroupId where manufacturer in ('Kyocera', 'KYOCERA');
queryDbListDeviceC: SELECT distinct  DeviceId  FROM  [HDA].[dbo].[KyoKFSDevice] a with (nolock) Inner join KyoKFSGroups b with (nolock) on a.GroupId = b.GroupId Inner join KyoKFSGroups d with (nolock) on b.OriginGroupId = d.GroupId where manufacturer in ('Kyocera', 'KYOCERA') and a.managementStatus not in ('5')
queryDbListDeviceB: SELECT TOP 100 c.groupName 'Origin Group',a.serialNumber,a.DeviceId,CASE a.managementStatus WHEN 1 THEN 'Gestita' WHEN 2 THEN 'Monitorata' WHEN 3 THEN 'Archiviata' END 'Tipo_Gestione',CASE a.devicestatus WHEN 1 THEN 'Ready' WHEN 2 THEN 'Warning' WHEN 3 THEN 'Error' WHEN 4 THEN 'Offline' WHEN 5 THEN 'Monitoring' END 'Stato',IIF(a.[color]=0, 'BW', 'COLOR') 'Machine Type',COUNT(a.deviceid) 'MIF',CONVERT(VARCHAR, YEAR(a.lastupdate)) + '_' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, MONTH(a.lastupdate)) 'Year_Month' FROM kyokfsdevice a INNER JOIN KyoKFSGroups b ON a.GroupId = b.GroupId INNER JOIN KyoKFSGroups c ON b.OriginGroupId = c.GroupId WHERE a.manufacturer IN ('KYOCERA', 'Kyocera', 'kyocera') AND a.managementstatus NOT IN ('3') AND a.deviceStatus NOT IN ('4') AND c.GroupId IN ('C2UV5SA', '0MVVDCD', 'C2U5DCB') GROUP BY c.groupName, a.managementStatus, a.COLOR, a.devicestatus, a.lastupdate, a.serialNumber, a.DeviceId ORDER BY 'Origin Group' ASC;
queryDbListDevice: SELECT TOP 1000 c.groupName 'Origin Group',a.serialNumber,a.DeviceId,CASE a.managementStatus WHEN 1 THEN 'Gestita' WHEN 2 THEN 'Monitorata' WHEN 3 THEN 'Archiviata' END 'Tipo_Gestione',CASE a.devicestatus WHEN 1 THEN 'Ready' WHEN 2 THEN 'Warning' WHEN 3 THEN 'Error' WHEN 4 THEN 'Offline' WHEN 5 THEN 'Monitoring' END 'Stato',IIF(a.[color]=0, 'BW', 'COLOR') 'Machine Type',COUNT(a.deviceid) 'MIF',CONVERT(VARCHAR, YEAR(a.lastupdate)) + '_' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, MONTH(a.lastupdate)) 'Year_Month' FROM kyokfsdevice a INNER JOIN KyoKFSGroups b ON a.GroupId = b.GroupId INNER JOIN KyoKFSGroups c ON b.OriginGroupId = c.GroupId WHERE a.manufacturer IN ('KYOCERA', 'Kyocera', 'kyocera') AND a.managementstatus NOT IN ('3') AND a.deviceStatus NOT IN ('4') AND c.GroupId IN ('C2UV5SA', '0MVVDCD', 'C2U5DCB') GROUP BY c.groupName, a.managementStatus, a.COLOR, a.devicestatus, a.lastupdate, a.serialNumber, a.DeviceId ORDER BY 'Origin Group' ASC;
